author: William Hazlitt
quote: A wise traveler never despises his own country.

author: Felix Baumgartner
quote: Aviation - and space travel, in particular - have always been especially captivating.

author: Paul Theroux
quote: I wouldn't say that I'm a travel novelist, but rather a novelist who travels - and who uses travel as a background for finding stories of places.

author: Werner Herzog
quote: I travel without barely any luggage. Just a second set of underwear and binoculars and a map and a toothbrush.

author: Charles C. Mann
quote: A world with a sudden limit on air travel would be tremendously different from the one we live in now.

author: Stephen A. Schwarzman
quote: It's wonderful to learn about new cultures and to be able to travel easily to so many countries.

author: Jonathan Edwards
quote: The way to Heaven is ascending; we must be content to travel uphill, though it be hard and tiresome, and contrary to the natural bias of our flesh.

author: Jim Harrison
quote: After a lifetime of world travel I've been fascinated that those in the third world don't have the same perception of reality that we do.

author: Mohit Chauhan
quote: Being in a band is like a small family. You travel together, make music, and share time with each other.

author: Anne Wojcicki
quote: There's going to be space travel at some point.

author: Roberto Bolaño
quote: Every hundred feet the world changes

author: Wallis Simpson
quote: I never make a trip to the United States without visiting a supermarket. To me they are more fascinating than any fashion salon.

author: Margaret Atwood
quote: Science fiction is filled with Martians and space travel to other planets, and things like that.

author: Alain de Botton
quote: I do think that travel can be part of a journey of inner maturation, but you've got to do it right.

author: Deion Sanders
quote: Sure we're in limos. We're stars. How else is a star supposed to travel?

author: Paul Theroux
quote: Tourists don't know where they've been, travelers don't know where they're going.

author: John Burroughs
quote: Travel and society polish one, but a rolling stone gathers no moss, and a little moss is a good thing on a man.

author: Unknown
quote: So much of who we are is where we have been.

author: Unknown
quote: Wherever you go, go with all your heart.

author: Caroline Wozniacki
quote: It's very expensive to be a professional tennis player with all the travel and the flights and the hotels and everything.

author: Morley Safer
quote: The helicopter is a fine way to travel, but it induces a view of the world that only God and CEOs share on a regular basis.

author: Matt Smith
quote: Time travel is such a magic concept.

author: Unknown
quote: Only those who risk going too far can possibly find out how far one can go.

author: Anna Quindlen
quote: Books are the plane, and the train, and the road. They are the destination, and the journey. They are home.

author: Jimmy Walker
quote: I travel all over the country, all over the world, and I'm happy to call Texas home.

author: Ella Maillart
quote: Certain travellers give the impression that they keep moving because only then do they feel fully alive.

author: W. C. Fields
quote: Reminds me of my safari in Africa. Somebody forgot the corkscrew and for several days we had to live on nothing but food and water.

author: Roger McGuinn
quote: I love being a troubadour. I travel around the world with my wife and play little theaters. We have a ball.

author: R. Buckminster Fuller
quote: How often I found where I should be going only by setting out for somewhere else.

author: T. S. Eliot
quote: We shall not cease from exploration, and the end of all our exploring will be to arrive where we started and know the place for the first time.

author: Matsuo Bashō
quote: The journey itself is my home.

author: Unknown
quote: To travel is to discover that everyone is wrong about other countries.

author: Lily Collins
quote: I love getting oxygen facials because I travel a lot. My skin gets pretty dry with all the airplanes.

author: Will Steger
quote: Within 10 years it will be impossible to travel to the North Pole by dog team. There will be too much open water.

author: Juliana Hatfield
quote: I don't buy a lot when I travel, but when I do, I like to send gifts from wherever I am. It's fun to find the local post office.

author: Angelina Jolie
quote: We travel often to Asia, Africa, Europe, where they were born.

author: Melania Trump
quote: Nobody controls me. I travel with my husband when I can, when I know that I can go, and I know that my son is okay alone for a few days with the help.

author: Alessia Cara
quote: It's amazing: it's so cool being from Brampton, Ontario, and being able to travel the world and being embraced by so many countries.

author: Loretta Lynn
quote: I'd love to travel to the Holy Land.

author: Paolo Bacigalupi
quote: I'm not proud of it, but I'm a great liar when I travel. I smile and lie, and things are smooth.

author: Unknown
quote: Once a year, go someplace you’ve never been before.

author: Mason Cooley
quote: Travelers never think that they are the foreigners.

author: Alex Pareene
quote: Furloughing a bunch of air traffic controllers has a pretty easy-to-predict effect on air travel: It causes delays.

author: Unknown
quote: Life begins at the end of your comfort zone.

author: Justine Larbalestier
quote: I travel way too much to have any pets. But if I could have one, I'd want a quokka. They're basically small kangaroos native to Western Australia.

author: Liberty Hyde Bailey
quote: When the traveler goes alone he gets acquainted with himself.

author: Unknown
quote: And I think to myself, what a wonderful world.

author: B. J. Novak
quote: Travel is impossible, but daydreaming about travel is easy.

author: Unknown
quote: If you think adventure is dangerous, try routine, it is lethal.

author: Marshall McLuhan
quote: The photograph reverses the purpose of travel, which until now had been to encounter the strange and unfamiliar.

author: John Tesh
quote: I am always exhausted; I am always trying to find more time to be with my family, which is why they travel with me so much.

author: Drew Barrymore
quote: I would love to be a travel writer. I'd be so stoked.

author: Lilly Singh
quote: My fans are honestly so unique and so similar. Wherever I travel, they are so, so different but so the same.

author: Rainbow Rowell
quote: I like science fiction, I like fantasy, I like time travel, so I had this idea: What if you had a phone that could call into the past?

author: Nancy Gibbs
quote: The real luxury travel of the modern age is not through space; it's through time.

author: Bob Dylan
quote: The land created me. I'm wild and lonesome. Even as I travel the cities, I'm more at home in the vacant lots.

author: Lin Yutang
quote: No one realizes how beautiful it is to travel until he comes home and rests his head on his old, familiar pillow.

author: Charlie Hunnam
quote: Good-quality travel and good-quality food are the two luxuries that I never have any guilt indulging in.

author: Philip Reeve
quote: I don't travel much; I just stay at home and imagine weird places.

author: Terry Brooks
quote: Hurt leads to bitterness, bitterness to anger, travel too far that road and the way is lost.

author: Maria Sharapova
quote: When you travel so many weeks a year, it's always nice to have a home-cooked meal.

author: Unknown
quote: Live to travel. Travel to live.

author: Dave Eggers
quote: Here I am Rock You Like a Hurricane.

author: Anais Nin
quote: We travel, some of us forever, to seek other states, other lives, other souls.

author: Jim Hinckley
quote: It is better to fill your head with useless knowledge than no knowledge at all.

author: Ella Maillart
quote: One travels to run away from routine, that dreadful routine that kills all imagination and all our capacity for enthusiasm.

author: Rosalyn Sussman Yalow
quote: Everything's a real passion to me - my children, my family, my work, travel. I don't play tennis, I don't play music, but I have a great time.

author: Pharrell Williams
quote: My ideal travel companions are my family.

author: Seann William Scott
quote: It's been a huge blessing, being able to travel and have a great life.

author: Banana Yoshimoto
quote: No matter where you are, you're always a bit on your own, always an outsider.

author: Patty Smyth
quote: It's funny. You travel all over the world, and you wind up with a guy from your hometown.

author: Marie Helvin
quote: If I'm on holiday, I travel light, but if it is a work trip, I take everything but the kitchen sink.

author: Xun Kuang
quote: The person attempting to travel two roads at once will get nowhere.

author: John Cleese
quote: Michael Palin decided to give up on his considerable comedy talents to make those dreadfully tedious travel shows. Have you ever tried to watch one?

author: Douglas Adams
quote: It can hardly be a coincidence that no language on earth has ever produced the expression, 'As pretty as an airport.

author: Aldous Huxley
quote: To travel is to discover that everyone is wrong about other countries.

author: Mandy Moore
quote: I want to go to college to study journalism. I want to speak French fluently, to travel. My mom was a journalist and it's in my blood.

author: Imtiaz Ali
quote: Through travel, you discover a new aspect to your personality. You discover things which you wouldn't seated in the confines of your home.

author: Henny Youngman
quote: Just got back from a pleasure trip: I took my mother-in-law to the airport.

author: Unknown
quote: Wanderlust: a strong desire to wander and explore the world.

author: David A. Bednar
quote: The Book of Mormon is our handbook of instructions as we travel the pathway from bad to good to better and strive to have our hearts changed.

author: Levon Helm
quote: I never subscribe to the stay-at-home policy. I'm not sick of the road or sick of eating in good restaurants around the country. I like to travel.

author: Lawrence Durrell
quote: Travel can be one of the most rewarding forms of introspection.

author: Gene Simmons
quote: I fly economy. I do often fly first class, but I don't travel with a posse, or bodyguard, or an assistant.

author: Unknown
quote: Paris is always a good idea.

author: Zaha Hadid
quote: All the privileged can travel, see different worlds; not everyone can. I think it is important for people to have an interesting locale nearby.

author: Christopher Walken
quote: I like to go to work, and also, I don't have any kids. I don't have any hobbies. I don't like to travel. So going to work is kind of it.

author: Unknown
quote: A mind that is stretched by a new experience can never go back to its old dimensions.

author: Robert Benchley
quote: In America there are two classes of travel - first class, and with children.

author: Clifton Fadiman
quote: When you travel, remember that a foreign country is not designed to make you comfortable. It is designed to make its own people comfortable.

author: Paul Theroux
quote: Travel is glamorous only in retrospect.

author: Robert Kiyosaki
quote: Fuel prices are at the center of our lives. They affect our ability to travel, stay warm, and feed ourselves.

author: E.E. Cummings
quote: May came home with a smooth round stone as small as a world and as large as alone.

author: Rachel Boston
quote: I go on walks during lunch breaks and travel with a fold-up yoga mat. I also love reading by candlelight at night.

author: Shakuntala Devi
quote: You develop a sympathy for all human beings when you travel a lot.

author: Park Chan-wook
quote: If your work requires you to travel, you will understand that there's no vacation destination like home.

author: Kate Douglas Wiggin
quote: There a kind of magicness about going far away and then coming back all changed.

author: Thornton Wilder
quote: Only it seems to me that once in your life before you die you ought to see a country where they don't talk in English and don't even want to.

author: Saint Augustine
quote: The world is a book, and those who do not travel read only a page.

author: George Eliot
quote: Our deeds still travel with us from afar, and what we have been makes us what we are.

author: George A. Romero
quote: I sit around listening to classical music. I don't play video games. I love to go to dinner, go on picnics, travel.

author: Derek Walcott
quote: I read; I travel; I become

author: Jose Andres
quote: People travel north from Barcelona, not south.

author: Debbie Reynolds
quote: Travel is hard, but entertaining is joy.

author: Jose Saramago
quote: I am traveling less in order to be able to write more. I select my travel destinations according to their degree of usefulness to my work.

author: Song Hye-kyo
quote: I cry if something bad happens. I grab a drink with friends when I get stressed out. I travel. I sometimes lash out at my closest friends.

author: Cate Blanchett
quote: I think the only thing I knew for sure is that I wanted to, whatever I did, I wanted to travel with my work, an adventurous spirit.

author: Elizabeth Gilbert
quote: to travel is worth any cost or sacrifice.

author: Chuck Palahniuk
quote: My favorite books to give or get are short story collections. And always paperbacks because they are easy to carry as you travel.

author: Leos Carax
quote: I travel, I read, I write, I have other lives. But when I have a camera, I know that's my country, my island.

author: George A. Moore
quote: A man travels the world over in search of what he needs and returns home to find it.

author: Lin Yutang
quote: A good traveller is one who does not know where he is going to, and a perfect traveller does not know where he came from.

author: O. R. Melling
quote: All my books reflect travel adventures of some kind, and all have a soul: a spiritual or mystical underpinning.

author: J.R.R. Tolkien
quote: Not all those who wander are lost.

author: Leonardo DiCaprio
quote: I get a friend to travel with me... I need somebody to bring me back to who I am. It's hard to be alone.

author: Robert Louis Stevenson
quote: To travel hopefully is a better thing than to arrive.

author: Harry Chapin
quote: But you can travel on for ten thousand miles, and still stay where you are.

author: Ruzwana Bashir
quote: What you do on travel holiday is what your memories are based on. People want to do cool stuff, and this is what will shape your entire experience.

author: Emma Watson
quote: When I haven't been working I've tried to travel a lot.

author: Jochen Zeitz
quote: It's shocking to think about how little the travel industry cares about sustainability - and it's the basis of their business!

author: Neil Armstrong
quote: The one thing I regret was that my work required an enormous amount of my time, and a lot of travel.

author: W. H. Auden
quote: Of all possible subjects, travel is the most difficult for an artist, as it is the easiest for a journalist.

author: Joe Garcia
quote: The growth of purposeful travel is a good thing. It can have a positive impact. We should continue to experiment and move along this line.

author: Buzz Aldrin
quote: Space travel for everyone is the next frontier in the human experience.

author: James Cameron
quote: I love short trips to New York; to me it is the finest three-day town on earth.

author: Hillary Clinton
quote: I want to teach. I want to speak. I want to travel.

author: Larry Fitzgerald
quote: I love to see new things, and I love to learn. I always learn so much when I travel - that's the best thing.

author: Benjamin Disraeli
quote: London is a roost for every bird.

author: Henry Rollins
quote: The Bad Seeds are a band I will travel a great distance to see whenever possible.

author: Martin Buber
quote: All journeys have secret destinations of which the traveler is unaware.

author: Pooja Hegde
quote: I see travelling as a great learning process, and my biggest dream is to travel the world.

author: Fred Armisen
quote: I travel a lot. I'll go back and forth, you know, West Coast-East Coast, but it's separated by segments. So it's not a daily thing.

author: Oscar Wilde
quote: I never travel without my diary. One should always have something sensational to read in the train.

author: Howard Nemerov
quote: Nothing in the universe can travel at the speed of light, they say, forgetful of the shadow's speed.

author: Andrew Sullivan
quote: We've got fuel prices coming down and good travel numbers coming out, so it's not surprising airline stocks are going up.

author: Henry Rollins
quote: I think young people should travel and travel often to other countries... like I do.

author: Brad Pitt
quote: I don't feel restless, I just like to travel.

author: Hans Christian Andersen
quote: To travel is to live.

author: Hedy Lamarr
quote: I've met the most interesting people while flying or on a boat. These methods of travel seem to attract the kind of people I want to be with.

author: Ana Ivanovic
quote: When I was starting out, it was almost impossible for me to get visas to travel to tournaments.

author: Patton Oswalt
quote: I've gotten very cynical and kind of anhedonic about all the things I have to do to get to do comedy: all the travel, hotels, and airports.

author: Zac Brown
quote: You can tell all our songs come from us and from our artists, the people we write with and travel with.

author: Jack Kerouac
quote: So shut up, live, travel, adventure, bless and don't be sorry

author: Ramakrishna
quote: Travel in all the four quarters of the earth, yet you will find nothing anywhere. Whatever there is, is only here.

author: Pierre Nanterme
quote: I hate to travel.

author: Unknown
quote: Though we travel the world over to find the beautiful, we must carry it with us or we find it not.

author: Hans Christian Andersen
quote: To move, to breathe, to fly, to float, To gain all while you give, To roam the roads of lands remote, To travel is to live.

author: Diane von Furstenberg
quote: I travel in so many different ways; I travel high, I rough it... it all depends on who I travel with.

author: Guillermo del Toro
quote: I love to travel, anywhere in the world. Wherever it is... India... Tibet... wherever. I'll go anywhere.

author: Michael Palin
quote: The trouble with travelling back later on is that you can never repeat the same experience.

author: William Shakespeare
quote: I had rather have a fool to make me merry than experience to make me sad and to travel for it too!

author: Mark Twain
quote: I have found out that there ain't no surer way to find out whether you like people or hate them than to travel with them.

author: Walter Benjamin
quote: How many cities have revealed themselves to me in the marches I undertook in the pursuit of books!

author: Simon Sinek
quote: Halloween is one of my favorite days of the year. I have a strict rule: I don't work on Halloween and I won't travel on Halloween. Not for any reason.

author: Andre Balazs
quote: One of the few luxuries left is travel. And the aspect of travel that is luxurious is not the movement, but the being there.

author: Unknown
quote: It is better to travel well than to arrive.

author: Unknown
quote: To say yes to life is at one and the same thing to say yes to oneself.

author: Linda Gray
quote: I'm extremely blessed because I travel extensively for my work, but I always try to incorporate a bit of leisure with business.

author: Kina Grannis
quote: I get to travel around the world and meet all of these amazing people, and they're singing my songs! And to me, that's crazy.

author: Unknown
quote: Wherever you go becomes a part of you somehow.

author: Don McCullin
quote: Every street in London has a camera, and if you ever travel up the M4, it feels as if George Orwell should be your chauffeur.

author: Edward M. Lerner
quote: Time travel offends our sense of cause and effect - but maybe the universe doesn't insist on cause and effect.

author: Meghan Markle
quote: I always want off-the-beaten-path, Anthony Bourdain-inspired travel.

author: Margaret Thatcher
quote: You and I come by road or rail, but economists travel on infrastructure.

author: Sepp Blatter
quote: The important thing for me was that the World Cup should travel round the world.

author: Erol Ozan
quote: You can't understand a city without using its public transportation system.

author: Gray Scott
quote: Immortality may be impossible, but imagine what humanity could learn if we all lived 700 years. We could travel deep into utopia and beyond.

author: Lily Collins
quote: I have amazing memories of being able to travel and being able to have family all over the world.

author: Unknown
quote: Venice is like eating an entire box of chocolate liqueurs in one go.

author: Unknown
quote: Adventure is worthwhile.

author: Brian Selznick
quote: I address you all tonight for who you truly are: wizards, mermaids, travelers, adventurers, and magicians. You are the true dreamers.

author: Bill Bryson
quote: The first book I did - the first successful book - was a kind of a travel book, and publishers in Britain encouraged me to do more.

author: Ruth Reinhardt
quote: I really love mountain sports, hiking, skiing, and I love to travel and get to know different places and cultures.

author: Margot Robbie
quote: Any time I have any time off, I try to travel.

author: John Malkovich
quote: I'm a little bit phobic about stains on my clothes, so I never travel without a little packet of organic stain remover.

author: David Mitchell
quote: ...there ain't no journey what don't change you some.

author: Toni Collette
quote: I don't mind where I work, it's really nice to be able to travel around and taste the flavours of different countries.

author: Ella Maillart
quote: Travel can also be the spirit of adventure somewhat tamed, for those who desire to do something they are a bit afraid of.

author: Rudyard Kipling
quote: He travels the fastest who travels alone.

author: Philip Stanhope, 4th Earl of Chesterfield
quote: The world is a country which nobody ever yet knew by description; one must travel through it one's self to be acquainted with it.

author: Marion Cotillard
quote: What I like in this job is you can travel to many places, many imaginations.

author: T.S. Eliot
quote: So I find words I never thought to speak In streets I never thought I should revisit When I left my body on a distant shore.

author: Guy Clark
quote: I get pretty much all the exercise I need walking down airport concourses carrying bags.

author: Mary-Kate Olsen
quote: Our career is a dream. I mean, we get to act, travel around the world, and meet cool people. What's not to love!

author: Unknown
quote: Life is short and the world is wide.

author: Alphonse de Lamartine
quote: If one had but a single glance to give the world, one should gaze on Istanbul.

author: Nadia Comaneci
quote: We are not coaching on a daily basis because we often travel with our charity and commercial interests.

author: Rob Gronkowski
quote: My mom would always travel with us to everything; my dad introduced us to the weight room and showed us how to properly work out.

author: Jenny McCarthy
quote: When I travel, I like to take advantage of room service. I'm really into eggs Benedict in the morning.

author: Parker Stevenson
quote: I like people who are enthused about things they do, like travel, sports, work. I like being with people who have things they're excited about.

author: Sarah Huckabee Sanders
quote: I got to work for my hero and travel with him on a regular basis. It doesn't get much better than that for a job.

author: Unknown
quote: The real voyage of discovery consists not in seeking new landscapes, but in having new eyes.

author: David Attenborough
quote: Before the BBC, I joined the Navy in order to travel.

author: Dolly Parton
quote: I'll bring my grits when I travel, because I get so hungry on the road.

author: John Lubbock
quote: We may sit in our library and yet be in all quarters of the earth.

author: John D. Rockefeller
quote: If you want to succeed you should strike out on new paths, rather than travel the worn paths of accepted success.

author: Moby
quote: I don't sleep very well when I travel. And as a result, I tend to be awake in cities when everyone else is asleep.

author: Saadi
quote: Roam abroad in the world, and take thy fill of its enjoyments before the day shall come when thou must quit it for good.

author: J. Maarten Troost
quote: The gift of sobriety is clarity and a sense of connection - and travel only enhances that.

author: Jennifer Aniston
quote: I want to see friends more and travel more.

author: Danny Kaye
quote: To travel is to take a journey into yourself.

author: Helen Hayes
quote: When traveling with someone, take large does of patience and tolerance with your morning coffee.

author: Colum McCann
quote: There's a part of me that thinks perhaps we go on existing in a place even after we've left it.

author: Barun Sobti
quote: My wife and I love to travel, so if we don't have work on either her or my birthday, we definitely travel.

author: Yoko Ono
quote: I've always said that I use my voice as an instrument. It was something I created myself, and I said, 'Have voice, will travel.'

author: Marcel Proust
quote: The real voyage of discovery consists not in seeking new landscapes, but in having new eyes.

author: Jason Day
quote: I travel with Club Glove.

author: Anita Desai
quote: Wherever you go becomes a part of you somehow.

author: Jane Lindskold
quote: The only thing I like about air travel is it gives me time to read.

author: Robin Wright
quote: When I had money in the past, I would always travel rather than spend it on big apartments or cars. And I still feel exactly the same way.

author: Unknown
quote: The gladdest moments, me thinks, is a departure into unknown lands.

author: Charles Kuralt
quote: The everyday kindness of the back roads more than makes up for the acts of greed in the headlines.

author: Unknown
quote: Do not go where the path may lead; go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.

author: Truman Capote
quote: Venice is like eating an entire box of chocolate liqueurs in one go.

author: Robert Ballard
quote: I can't travel without Sudoku.

author: Rumi
quote: Travel brings power and love back into your life.

author: Matt Mullenweg
quote: When I travel, which is most of the year, I live in TripIt.

author: Jules Verne
quote: Ah! Young people, travel if you can, and if you cannot - travel all the same!

author: Anaïs Nin
quote: We travel, some of us forever, to seek other states, other lives, other souls.

author: Jacqueline Cochran
quote: I have found adventure in flying, in world travel, in business, and even close at hand... Adventure is a state of mind - and spirit.

author: Pete Hamill
quote: Travel at least erodes some of the narrowness that exists in each of us.

author: Imtiaz Ali
quote: I think I am a travel junkie, and I have never enjoyed anything else in my life more than travelling and going to places.

author: Ella Maillart
quote: You do not travel if you are afraid of the unknown, you travel for the unknown, that reveals you with yourself.

author: Erol Ozan
quote: Some beautiful paths can't be discovered without getting lost.

author: Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie
quote: I think you travel to search and you come back home to find yourself there.

author: Poppy Delevingne
quote: I only travel with one suitcase - Mulberry does an incredible one. I always check it; the TSA restrictions are so tricky.

author: Kip Thorne
quote: 'Closed timelike curve' is the jargon for time travel. It means you go out, come back and meet yourself in the past.

author: Unknown
quote: Never get so busy making a living that you forget to make a life.

author: Jeff Goldblum
quote: No matter how you travel, it's still you going.

author: Solange Knowles
quote: You get educated by traveling.

author: Douglas Brinkley
quote: The myth-making about Appomattox started from the moment Lee left the courthouse on his horse to travel to Richmond.

author: Amy Cuddy
quote: Trust is the conduit for influence; it's the medium through which ideas travel.

author: Hannah Simone
quote: If I could travel back in time, I'd bring back the entire Wu-Tang Clan.

author: Buddha
quote: It is better to travel well than to arrive.

author: Eva Green
quote: I want to travel. Maybe I'll end up living in Norway, making cakes.

author: Nadia Comaneci
quote: Now, I have a kid, I have businesses to take care of, I have to travel. I have to sit down... and find a little time for me.

author: Ivan Glasenberg
quote: You want to be a trader, come be a trader. The door's open. You want to travel six days a week, you want to travel the world, the door's open.

author: Unknown
quote: Little by little, one travels far.

author: Stephen Hawking
quote: Time travel was once considered scientific heresy, and I used to avoid talking about it for fear of being labelled a 'crank.'

author: Gilbert K. Chesterton
quote: The whole object of travel is not to set foot on foreign land; it is at last to set foot on one's own country as a foreign land.

author: Daryl Hall
quote: Yes, I travel in unusual circles. George Osborne and his wife Frances are my cousins.

author: Maeve Binchy
quote: I have been lucky enough to travel a lot, meet great people in many lands. I have liked almost everyone I met along the way.

author: George Carlin
quote: What does it mean to pre-board? Do you get on before you get on?

author: John Steinbeck
quote: You don't even know where I'm going." "I don't care. I'd like to go anywhere.

author: Unknown
quote: To awaken quite alone in a strange town is one of the most pleasant sensations in the world.

author: Richard K. Morgan
quote: Good authors mature over time: it does take awhile. Travel abroad and learn to live in other cultures. That's one of the things about teaching abroad.

author: Roman Payne
quote: O, Sunlight! The most precious gold to be found on Earth.

author: Thomas Jefferson
quote: I think one travels more usefully when they travel alone, because they reflect more." ( June 19, 1787)

author: William Hazlitt
quote: It is not fit that every man should travel; it makes a wise man better, and a fool worse.

author: Unknown
quote: Life is either a daring adventure or nothing.

author: Hans Christian Andersen
quote: Travelling expands the mind rarely.

author: Zach Braff
quote: The best way to travel abroad is to live with the locals.

author: Victoria Beckham
quote: I just can't do heels any more. At least not when I'm working. I travel a lot.

author: Jesse Eisenberg
quote: I get very homesick, but otherwise it's a great privilege to get to travel for work.

author: Jeff Goldblum
quote: I travel for work, but recently, friends said I should take major trips.

author: Rosalia de Castro
quote: I see my path, but I don't know where it leads. Not knowing where I'm going is what inspires me to travel it.

author: P. J. O'Rourke
quote: I do have to travel a lot for speaking engagements.

author: Seth Rollins
quote: The joke we always say is that WWE doesn't pay us to wrestle, they pay us to travel.

author: Chris Stapleton
quote: I always tell people, 'The music's free. I get paid to travel.'

author: Jesmyn Ward
quote: Physical books are still my favorite, but I own an e-book reader. They're convenient for travel.

author: William Hazlitt
quote: You know more of a road by having traveled it than by all the conjectures and descriptions in the world.

author: Paul Theroux
quote: The job of the travel writer is to go far and wide, to make voluminous notes, to tell the truth.

author: Seneca
quote: If you really want to escape the things that harass you, what you’re needing is not to be in a different place but to be a different person.

author: Fanny Burney
quote: Traveling is the ruin of all happiness! There's no looking at a building after seeing Italy.

author: Kylie Jenner
quote: Tyga's one of my best friends ever, so it's so much fun to travel with him. I always like having my friends out on the road with me.

author: Doris Lessing
quote: I think kids ought to travel. I think it's very good to carry kids around. It's good for them. Of course it's tough on the parents.

author: Rajeev Suri
quote: I'm a digital reader. When I travel abroad, I don't want to pack physical books, and I even like reading on my smartphone.

author: Lin Yutang
quote: No one realizes how beautiful it is to travel until he comes home and rests his head on his old, familiar pillow.

author: Deontay Wilder
quote: To build my legacy and be that person I want to be, this is what it's going to take: to get on the road and travel. Let's do it that way.

author: Ingmar Bergman
quote: I hate to travel. I don't go anywhere.

author: Deborah Moggach
quote: Everything will be alright in the end so if it is not alright it is not the end.

author: Meghan Markle
quote: I love Ralph Lauren. As I travel so much, I prefer to shop online.

author: James Altucher
quote: Don't time travel into the past, roaming through the nuances as if they can change. Don't bookmark pages you've already read.

author: Henry Miller
quote: One's destination is never a place, but a new way of seeing things.

author: Robin Leach
quote: In Italy, they add work and life on to food and wine.

author: Elvis Mitchell
quote: I dress well. I travel; I seem to be relatively glamorous for a film guy - which, to me, is like being the fastest midget in the circus.

author: Judith Thurman
quote: Every dreamer knows that it is entirely possible to be homesick for a place you've never been to, perhaps more homesick than for familiar ground.

author: Ray Bradbury
quote: See the world. It's more fantastic than any dream made or paid for in factories. Ask for no guarantees, ask for no security.

author: David Mitchell
quote: Travel far enough, you meet yourself.

author: Eudora Welty
quote: Through travel I first became aware of the outside world; it was through travel that I found my own introspective way into becoming a part of it.

author: Sargent Shriver
quote: Just to travel is rather boring, but to travel with a purpose is educational and exciting.

author: Aleksandr Solzhenitsyn
quote: Own only what you can always carry with you: know languages, know countries, know people. Let your memory be your travel bag.

author: Unknown
quote: Your imagination is your preview of life’s coming attractions.

author: Iggy Pop
quote: I'm a travel enthusiast.

author: Edward Ruscha
quote: I travel a lot, but I don't come away with new inspiration.

author: Ruth Negga
quote: I don't like hobbies. I read and travel and see my friends before they disown me.

author: Nikos Kazantzakis
quote: Every perfect traveler always creates the country where he travels.

author: Charles Kuralt
quote: Thanks to the Interstate Highway System, it is now possible to travel across the country from coast to coast without seeing anything.

author: Erma Bombeck
quote: Did you ever notice that the first piece of luggage on the carousel never belongs to anyone?

author: George Vecsey
quote: Ball caps travel far and wide. They do far more than keep the sun out of your eyes or the cold off your head. Ball caps are a statement.

author: Unknown
quote: Our happiest moments as tourists always seem to come when we stumble upon one thing while in pursuit of something else.

author: Walt Whitman
quote: I tramp a perpetual journey.

author: Matt Lucas
quote: The most useful form of time travel would be to go back a year or two and rectify the mistakes we made.

author: Unknown
quote: Travel is not reward for working, it’s education for living.

author: Zac Goldsmith
quote: In North America, more than half of all children travel to school by bus. We need a similar programme in London.

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
quote: Though we travel the world over to find the beautiful, we must carry it with us, or we find it not.

author: Henry Adams
quote: Everyone carries his own inch rule of taste, and amuses himself by applying it, triumphantly, wherever he travels.

author: Paul D. Boyer
quote: An unexpected benefit of my career in biochemistry has been travel.

author: Anderson Cooper
quote: The farther you go, however, the harder it is to return. The world has many edges, and it's easy to fall off.

author: Seth Rollins
quote: I do my best work alone. I travel alone a lot.

author: Peter Diamandis
quote: If you have a fear of flying, don't. The data are very clear: If you have to travel someplace, the safest way is by airplane.

author: Augustine of Hippo
quote: The world is a book, and those who don't travel only read one page.

author: Andre Gide
quote: To read a writer is for me not merely to get an idea of what he says, but to go off with him and travel in his company.

author: Lita Ford
quote: I like to travel. I love touring, I love playing.

author: Unknown
quote: Collect moments. Not things.

author: Miguel
quote: Travel aesthetics should be just as comfortable and practical as they are fashionable.

author: Audrey Hepburn
quote: Paris is always a good idea.

author: Elvis Mitchell
quote: In his very first film, Mr. Gonzalez Inarritu makes the kind of journey some directors don't - or can't - travel in an entire career.

author: Unknown
quote: Jet lag is for amateurs.

author: Unknown
quote: All journeys have secret destinations of which the traveler is unaware.

author: Nargis Fakhri
quote: No matter where I travel, I make sure to carry a Vaseline body lotion with me to keep my skin well moisturised all the time.

author: Ted Turner
quote: I travel a lot. I'm on the move.

author: Shiv Nadar
quote: On Sundays, we would travel to the town and watch English movies. This way, we must have ended up watching some 1,000 movies during college.

author: Paul Theroux
quote: The amount of hassle involved in travel can be overwhelming.

author: John Muir
quote: To the lover of wilderness, Alaska is one of the most wonderful countries in the world.

author: Ernest Hemingway
quote: Never go on trips with anyone you do not love.

author: Chief Joseph
quote: Let me be a free man - free to travel, free to stop, free to work.

author: Unknown
quote: Travel makes one modest, you see what a tiny place you occupy in the world.

author: Gilbert K. Chesterton
quote: The traveler sees what he sees, the tourist sees what he has come to see.

author: Frank Borman
quote: Exploration is really the essence of the human spirit.

author: Marina and the Diamonds
quote: Touring can be tough; the crew and I travel everywhere by a big pink bus, and live in petrol stations.

author: Augustine of Hippo
quote: The world is a book and those who do not travel read only one page.

author: David Ebershoff
quote: Sometimes when I travel, I like to close my eyes and imagine visiting during another era.

author: Samuel Johnson
quote: The use of travelling is to regulate imagination by reality, and instead of thinking how things may be, to see them as they are.

author: Lao Tzu
quote: A good traveler has no fixed plans, and is not intent on arriving.

author: Damon Albarn
quote: Being in Blur has allowed me to travel and hear the music that's being made all over the world.

author: John Paul DeJoria
quote: Rail travel for me is the most relaxing, most scenic way to see the country.

author: Hakan Nesser
quote: A good story can travel in time and borders; it hits you no matter where you are.

author: Unknown
quote: Because in the end, you won’t remember the time you spent working in an office or mowing your lawn. Climb that damn mountain.

author: Linda McCartney
quote: I would travel only by horse, if I had the choice.

author: Francois Hollande
quote: When I travel officially... and when I travel on a private basis, I have protection that is less suffocating. But I am protected everywhere.

author: Al Gore
quote: Airplane travel is nature's way of making you look like your passport photo.

author: Robert Louis Stevenson
quote: We are all travelers in the wilderness of this world, and the best we can find in our travels is an honest friend.

author: Miranda Raison
quote: I'm a bad traveller because I suffer from travel sickness.

author: Jhumpa Lahiri
quote: My grandfather says that's what books are for," Ashoke said, using the opportunity to open the volume in his hands. "To travel without moving an inch.

author: Matsuo Basho
quote: Every day is a journey, and the journey itself is home.

author: Diana Gabaldon
quote: In a great many stories that deal with time travel, there's usually somebody who knows how time travel works. They lay out the rules.

author: Martin Henderson
quote: I think it's part of my personality - I love to travel; I love different cultures and philosophies and perspectives on things.

author: Robert Louis Stevenson
quote: There are no foreign lands. It is the traveler only who is foreign.

author: Melania Trump
quote: My mom loved fashion. We loved to travel and go to Italy and Paris.

author: Unknown
quote: We travel not to escape life, but for life not to escape us.

author: Greg Gutfeld
quote: Travel like a pro, not like a hobo. That's my motto.

author: Winna Efendi
quote: Most of the time, beauty lies in the simplest of things.

author: Ma Jian
quote: Everything I was I carry with me, everything I will be lies waiting on the road ahead.

author: Horace
quote: Caelum non animum mutant qui trans mare currunt. ()

author: Tommy Wiseau
quote: I'm going to do more movies and travel.

author: Unknown
quote: Oh, the places you’ll go.

author: Mignon McLaughlin
quote: We all become great explorers during our first few days in a new city, or a new love affair.

author: Rene Redzepi
quote: People will travel anywhere for good food - it's crazy.

author: Brad Goreski
quote: I am very lucky to have the opportunity to travel to so many amazing destinations for work!

author: Ursula K. Le Guin
quote: It is good to have an end to journey toward; but it is the journey that matters, in the end.

author: Unknown
quote: Don’t count the days. Make the days count.

author: Morrissey
quote: If you travel to Germany, it's still absolutely Germany. If you travel to Sweden, it still has a Swedish identity.

author: Evelyn Glennie
quote: I associate going to an airport with work because I travel so much with my job. So when I have a few days free from work, I tend to stay at home.

author: Edi Gathegi
quote: I am sort of an adventurer. I like to explore new places. I don't get to travel as often as I would like but I love it.

author: Gustave Flaubert
quote: Travel makes one modest. You see what a tiny place you occupy in the world.

author: Reba McEntire
quote: Besides, I'm a gypsy at heart and I like to travel around.

author: Leonardo da Vinci
quote: For once you have tasted flight you will walk the earth with your eyes turned skywards, for there you have been and there you will long to return.

author: Mary Anne Radmacher
quote: I am not the same having seen the moon shine on the other side of the world.

author: Henry Rollins
quote: A lot of Americans don't have a passport, never will have a passport. Not only will they not travel, they don't want to travel.

author: Henry Rollins
quote: I just travel the world with my backpack and my cameras and a bunch of Clif bars.

author: Robyn Davidson
quote: I just don't see myself as a travel writer. I can't. I don't.

author: Liberty Ross
quote: I love the fabric of Genetic jeans. There's a softness. I always travel in them. It feels like you're in like your most comfortable pajamas.

author: Ernest Hemingway
quote: Writing and travel broaden your ass if not your mind and I like to write standing up.

author: Ray Bradbury
quote: We've gotta reinvest in space travel. We should've never left the moon.

author: Jacqueline Cochran
quote: I might have been born in a hovel but I am determined to travel with the wind and the stars.

author: Imtiaz Ali
quote: 'Love Aaj Kal' is not really a road movie, but it does involve some travel.

author: Rajeev Suri
quote: When I'm in London I always travel by public transport - I catch the Tube and the Heathrow Express.

author: Santosh Kalwar
quote: If life is a journey then let my soul travel and share your pain.

author: Meg White
quote: It's cool to meet your idols. It's a good opportunity to travel. Those kinds of things are good.

author: Satchel Paige
quote: Airplanes may kill you, but they ain't likely to hurt you.

author: G.K. Chesterton
quote: The traveler sees what he sees. The tourist sees what he has come to see.

author: Unknown
quote: Do not dare not to dare.

author: Tim Cahill
quote: I am living out my adolescent dream of travel and adventure.

author: Quincy Jones
quote: Young people should travel, and they don't. You can't know if you don't go.

author: Ted Nugent
quote: The good news is that real-world hands-on conservation is alive and well and catching on across the America I travel.

author: Diane von Furstenberg
quote: I travel light. I think the most important thing is to be in a good mood and enjoy life, wherever you are.

author: Robert Benchley
quote: There are two kinds of travel: first class and with children.

author: Stephen Curry
quote: I hope to play until I'm, like, 38 or something, and that's a lot of years in the game and a lot of travel and a lot of sacrifice on my family's part.

author: Blake Lively
quote: I love to photograph the gorgeous landscapes when I travel.

author: Gene Simmons
quote: I do often fly first class, but I don't travel with a posse, or bodyguard, or an assistant.

author: Unknown
quote: Why, I’d like nothing better than to achieve some bold adventure, worthy of our trip.

author: Lisa Randall
quote: Travel at faster than the speed of light certainly can have dramatic implications that are difficult to understand, such as time travel.

author: Caskie Stinnett
quote: I travel a lot; I hate having my life disrupted by routine.

author: Thomas Fuller
quote: Travel makes a wise man better, and a fool worse.

author: Mary Ritter Beard
quote: Certainly, travel is more than the seeing of sights; it is a change that goes on, deep and permanent, in the ideas of living.

author: Arijit Singh
quote: I still don't have a car. I still travel by public transport. I take autos to travel to and fro for recordings.

author: Jack Kerouac
quote: ...but I preferred reading the American landscape as we went along. Every bump, rise, and stretch in it mystified my longing.

author: Unknown
quote: It is good to have an end to journey toward; but it is the journey that matters, in the end.

author: Blake Lively
quote: I take a cooking class everywhere I travel. I find it's the best way to get to know a culture.

author: Dominic Monaghan
quote: I enjoy the preparatory elements of travel - packing my bags and choosing my outfits - but my favourite part is getting there.

author: William Blake
quote: Travelers repose and dream among my leaves.

author: John Steinbeck
quote: Many a trip continues long after movement in time and space have ceased.

author: Pauly D
quote: I travel every single day, but I make it a point to hit the gym. I want to look good for the summer.

author: Lisa Ling
quote: The best education I have ever received was through travel.

author: Hozier
quote: It was a rural upbringing by the seaside. A real quiet place surrounded by fields. I had to travel into town for school and stuff like that.

author: Roger Moore
quote: It's wonderful to travel with somebody that you love and we never travel anywhere without one another.

author: Zach Anner
quote: Spontaneity is what travel is all about.

author: Herman Melville
quote: In this world, shipmates, sin that pays its way can travel freely, and without passport; whereas Virtue, if a pauper, is stopped at all frontiers.

author: Ian Wright
quote: I never travel without my sketch book.

author: Barton Gellman
quote: The Patriot Act unleashed the FBI to search your email, travel and credit records without even a suspicion of wrongdoing.

author: Mohsin Hamid
quote: When I travel, I feel more like a nomad than a tourist.

author: Stephen Hawking
quote: Even if it turns out that time travel is impossible, it is important that we understand why it is impossible.

author: Roseanne Barr
quote: Men read maps better than women because only men can understand the concept of an inch equaling a hundred miles.

author: Christine McVie
quote: I'm pretty low-key. I travel fairly light, especially on the tour.

author: Dhani Jones
quote: Travel around the world is amazing. New people. New-found family, really.

author: Anna Quindlen
quote: In books I have traveled, not only to other worlds, but into my own.

author: James A. Michener
quote: If you reject the food, ignore the customs, fear the religion, and avoid the people, you might better stay home.

author: Julian Fellowes
quote: I always like to arrive at the airport early to enjoy breakfast and lounge about so that when I get on the plane all my travel fever has disappeared.

author: John Mackey
quote: In general, when you travel, you get into a different reality and are able to more accurately reflect on your ordinary life. Hiking does that for me.

author: Cesare Pavese
quote: If you wish to travel far and fast, travel light. Take off all your envies, jealousies, unforgiveness, selfishness and fears.

author: Taylor Lautner
quote: I do love traveling, so I've been able to travel a lot.

author: Curtis Jackson
quote: Eating well was something I learned as I started to be successful and had to travel and perform concerts, which are an intense cardio workout.

author: Mary Ellen Mark
quote: I wanted to travel from the beginning. As a kid, I used to dream about airplanes, before I ever flew in one.

author: Unknown
quote: I’m shaking the dust of this crummy little town off my feet and I’m gonna see the world.

author: Unknown
quote: I haven’t been everywhere, but it’s on my list.

author: Unknown
quote: Never let your memories be greater than your dreams.

author: Sundar Pichai
quote: I have a secret project which adds four hours every day to the 24 hours we have. There's a bit of time travel involved.

author: Werner Herzog
quote: The world reveals itself to those who travel on foot.

author: Orlando Bloom
quote: I generally travel with my laptop, a couple of great books, and my iPod.

author: Rudyard Kipling
quote: The first condition of understanding a foreign country is to smell it.

author: Lao Tzu
quote: A good traveler has no fixed plans and is not intent on arriving.

author: Gabriel Iglesias
quote: I usually travel with a posse. I roll deep. I travel like a rapper, but without the artillery. We don't carry guns, we carry cookies.

author: Paul Theroux
quote: Travel works best when you're forced to come to terms with the place you're in.

author: Laurie Hernandez
quote: Life has been a really big whirlwind, but it's been a lot of fun. I travel so much, and I'm constantly doing things that I love, but it's just me.

author: Peter Diamandis
quote: Because it's cheaper and easier to fly than ever before, air travel is becoming democratized.

author: Michael Bassey Johnson
quote: A good traveller is one who knows how to travel with the mind.

author: Alek Wek
quote: The beauty of reading is that it lets you travel in a way you could never know.

author: Aristophanes
quote: Why, I'd like nothing better than to achieve some bold adventure, worthy of our trip.

author: Robert Louis Stevenson
quote: I travel not to go anywhere, but to go. I travel for travel's sake. The great affair is to move.

author: Josh Billings
quote: To bring up a child in the way he should go, travel that way yourself once in a while.

author: Donald Richie
quote: Japan never considers time together as time wasted. Rather, it is time invested.

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
quote: Though we travel the world over to find the beautiful, we must carry it with us or we find it not.

author: Maureen O'Hara
quote: The Queen Mary was the most civilized and luxurious way one could travel to America in the late 1930s.

author: Mikhail Khodorkovsky
quote: I have to travel a lot, but relaxation to me is when I am at home.

author: Rob Gronkowski
quote: One of the places I'd like to travel to is Ibiza, off the coast of Spain.

author: Brad Goreski
quote: I only travel with a carry-on suitcase in most instances.

author: Seth Rollins
quote: Most of my workouts happen by myself because I travel so much.

author: Unknown
quote: To live will be an awfully big adventure.

author: Unknown
quote: Travel is the only thing you buy that makes you richer.

author: Norman Foster
quote: I travel continuously, and I see many cities, but there is nowhere like London.

author: Holly Marie Combs
quote: To travel America and see everything it has to offer, with my best friend, sounds like the perfect road trip.

author: Carrie Underwood
quote: I do not like people touching my underwear. That's just weird! I travel with a washer and dryer, and I like cooking on the bus, too.

author: Ursula K. Le Guin
quote: The explorer who will not come back or send back his ships to tell his tale is not an explorer, only an adventurer; and his sons are born in exile.

author: Neil Gaiman
quote: Wherever you go, you take yourself with you.

author: Theophilus London
quote: I need to travel, of course, with my laptop, so I can do my business on the road.

author: Hernan Cortes
quote: I love to travel, but hate to arrive.

author: Francis Bacon
quote: Travel, in the younger sort, is a part of education; in the elder, a part of experience.

author: Unknown
quote: Not all those who wander are lost.

author: Barton Gellman
quote: I favor pocket-sized hard drives that travel between home and office, syncing with computers on both ends.

author: Charles Horton Cooley
quote: To get away from one's working environment is, in a sense, to get away from one's self; and this is often the chief advantage of travel and change.

author: Dave Barry
quote: It always rains on tents. Rainstorms will travel thousands of miles, against prevailing winds for the opportunity to rain on a tent.

author: Unknown
quote: My favorite thing is to go where I’ve never been.

author: Roman Payne
quote: Never did the world make a queen of a girl who hides in houses and dreams without traveling.

author: Timothy Morton
quote: Invoking Nature always measures the distance we have yet to travel to achieve real progress on environmental issues.

author: Susan Sontag
quote: Travel becomes a strategy for accumulating photographs.

author: George Bernard Shaw
quote: I dislike feeling at home when I am abroad.

author: Jerry Costello
quote: Almost 70 percent of U.S. ag exports travel the upper Mississippi River and the Illinois waterway system.

author: Paul Theroux
quote: Extensive traveling induces a feeling of encapsulation, and travel, so broadening at first, contracts the mind.

author: Britney Spears
quote: The cool thing about being famous is traveling. I have always wanted to travel across seas, like to Canada and stuff.

author: Stephen Hawking
quote: A zero-gravity flight is a first step toward space travel.

author: Rob Machado
quote: I think I'm one of the most fortunate people in the world. I travel around looking for the best waves and appreciate it every second.

author: Greg Gutfeld
quote: Terror, married to technology and accommodated by progress in travel, has turned evil individuals into traveling ballistic missiles.

author: Alain de Botton
quote: Travel is a lot like love.

author: Alex Meraz
quote: It's like this - because I travel so much, I crave certain foods or certain things, like from certain places that I've been.

author: J.R.R. Tolkien
quote: All that is gold does not glitter, Not all those who wander are lost.

author: Unknown
quote: One’s destination is never a place, but a new way of seeing things.

author: Robin Leach
quote: Travel is very subjective. What one person loves, another loathes.

author: Jenny Lewis
quote: I wouldn't call it a faux pas, but I have about 12 tracksuits. I always travel in a tracksuit. I feel it makes people happy when they see me.

author: Malala Yousafzai
quote: I distracted myself from the fear and terrorism by thinking about things like how the universe began and whether time travel is possible.

author: Giotto di Bondone
quote: Rome is the city of echoes, the city of illusions, and the city of yearning.

author: Count Basie
quote: All I wanted was to be big, to be in show business and to travel... and that's what I've been doing all my life.

author: Robyn Davidson
quote: The truth is I'm not really interested in travel writing as it's generally conceived, and even less so in female travel writing.

author: Busy Philipps
quote: I always pack a travel snack bag. You don't want to get stuck without snacks no matter where you go!

author: Margaret Heffernan
quote: One of the sad truths about leadership is that, the higher up the ladder you travel, the less you know.

author: Shane L. Koyczan
quote: Don't let your luggage define your travels, each life unravels differently.

author: John Muir
quote: I never saw a discontented tree. They grip the ground as though they liked it, and though fast rooted they travel about as far as we do.

author: Charles Bukowski
quote: I heard an airplane passing overhead. I wished I was on it.

author: David Rockefeller
quote: I am a passionate traveler, and from the time I was a child, travel formed me as much as my formal education.

author: Diego Luna
quote: Mexico is where I fell in love for the first time; it's where my family lives... so however much I travel, I inevitably return there.

author: Jack Kerouac
quote: Our battered suitcases were piled on the sidewalk again; we had longer ways to go. But no matter, the road is life

author: Beyonce Knowles
quote: To be able to travel the world, especially to places I never thought I'd be... it's really, you know, still fascinating for me.

author: Kenny Leon
quote: Great theater continues to bind us, one to the other, and most of us will travel far and wide to see a good story told well.

author: Unknown
quote: If you are not willing to risk the unusual, you will have to settle for the ordinary.

author: Phil Collins
quote: When I go on Japanese Airlines, I really love it because I like Japanese food.

author: Yuri Milner
quote: You have to travel globally today to know what's going on and maintain an edge.

author: Karen Hughes
quote: The travel and tourism industry, it's just a huge part of our economy.

author: Evelyn Waugh
quote: I have a good mind not to take Aloysius to Venice. I don't want him to meet a lot of horrid Italian bears and pick up bad habits.

author: Jo Brand
quote: Everything becomes magnified at night. Sounds travel in a different way, it's dark, and everything seems far more spooky.

author: Chance The Rapper
quote: I want to travel overseas and help out people all over the world.

author: J.A. Redmerski
quote: I wonder if the ocean smells different on the other side of the world.

author: Confucius
quote: Wherever you go, go with all your heart.

author: Unknown
quote: The journey itself is my home.

author: Unknown
quote: The world is a book and those who do not travel read only one page.

author: Robert Thier
quote: Ships are my arrows, the sea my bow, the world my target.

author: Alexander Chase
quote: Lovers of air travel find it exhilarating to hang poised between the illusion of immortality and the fact of death.

author: Lao Tzu
quote: The journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.

author: Benjamin Disraeli
quote: Travel teaches toleration.

author: Benjamin Disraeli
quote: Like all great travellers, I have seen more than I remember, and remember more than I have seen.

author: Joe Abercrombie
quote: Travel brings wisdom only to the wise. It renders the ignorant more ignorant than ever.

author: Paul Theroux
quote: The travel impulse is mental and physical curiosity. It's a passion. And I can't understand people who don't want to travel.

author: Michael Palin
quote: I am not a great cook, I am not a great artist, but I love art, and I love food, so I am the perfect traveller.

author: Thomas Hood
quote: Some minds improve by travel, others, rather, resemble copper wire, or brass, which get the narrower by going farther.

author: Regina Brett
quote: There are few places you can find silence. Air travel could be the last fortress of solitude.

author: Unknown
quote: When preparing to travel, lay out all of your clothes and all of your money. Then take half the clothes and twice the money.

author: Theophilus London
quote: I collect a lot of clothes when I travel around the world.

author: Robert Louis Stevenson
quote: For my part, I travel not to go anywhere, but to go. I travel for travel's sake. The great affair is to move.

author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca
quote: Everywhere is nowhere. When a person spends all his time in foreign travel, he ends by having many acquaintances, but no friends.

author: Jerzy Kosinski
quote: Travel gives me the opportunity to walk through the sectors of cities where one can clearly see the passage of time.

author: W. Kamau Bell
quote: I've always been a fan of these travel shows and documentary series.

author: Cynthia Ozick
quote: Traveling is seeing; it is the implicit that we travel by.

author: K. D. Lang
quote: My public image is so low-key, but I get to travel the world and still have an audience and it's really amazing. I don't take that for granted.

author: David Attenborough
quote: I think a major element of jetlag is psychological. Nobody ever tells me what time it is at home.

author: Quincy Jones
quote: I travel like a maniac. I travel more than anyone I know. I love learning the languages.

author: Tom Brady
quote: People want to go out and travel around and meet cool people. I could just go live in Vermont, but is that what I really want?

author: Fred Allen
quote: I have just returned from Boston. It is the only thing to do if you find yourself up there.

author: Kevyn Aucoin
quote: I'd rather have huge success and huge failures than travel in the middle of the road.

author: Brian Greene
quote: The bottom line is that time travel is allowed by the laws of physics.

author: Alex Garland
quote: Tourists went on holidays while travellers did something else. They travelled.

author: Roman Payne
quote: I wandered everywhere, through cities and countries wide. And everywhere I went, the world was on my side.

author: Edmund Burke
quote: The traveller has reached the end of the journey!

author: Rick Scott
quote: Mom somehow made it to every one of my graduations - even when it meant she had to travel far away.

author: Dan Rather
quote: If all difficulties were known at the outset of a long journey, most of us would never start out at all.

author: Thomas Jefferson
quote: One travels more usefully when alone, because he reflects more.

author: Swami Vivekananda
quote: We are what our thoughts have made us; so take care about what you think. Words are secondary. Thoughts live; they travel far.

author: Kevin Plank
quote: I run five miles three times a week; I log everything. I look up routes when I travel.

author: Unknown
quote: The best dreams happen when you’re awake.

author: George Moore
quote: A man travels the world over in search of what he needs and returns home to find it.

author: Philippe Cousteau, Jr.
quote: My father's plan was, we were going to grow up and travel the world.

author: Marilyn vos Savant
quote: Know how to travel from your town to a nearby town without a car, either by bus or by rail.

author: Red Gerard
quote: I try to have as much fun as I can, and I travel around the world doing what I love.

author: Paramahansa Yogananda
quote: My keen love of travel was seldom hindered by Father. He permitted me, even as a mere boy, to visit many cities and pilgrimage spots.

author: Warren Spector
quote: Finney is about the best writer of time travel stories ever, and I adore time travel stories - have to make a time travel game someday!

author: Irina Shayk
quote: My favorite spot is the Maldives. Since I travel so much for work, I like to go to places that are very secluded and quiet.

author: Peter Capaldi
quote: If you travel in time and space, most of the people you know and love will eventually be gone. But you'll also be able to go and find them again.

author: Guy Kawasaki
quote: I travel all the time.

author: Eugenie Bouchard
quote: Sometimes you just want to get away and be normal for a few days. It's a treat to travel without your racket bag.

author: Tennessee Williams
quote: Make voyages. Attempt them. There's nothing else.

author: Ingvar Kamprad
quote: How the hell can I ask people who work for me to travel cheaply if I travel in luxury? It's a question of good leadership.

author: Charles Spurgeon
quote: A lie can travel half way around the world while the truth is putting on its shoes.

author: Rachel McAdams
quote: I don't really desire things. I prefer to spend my money on experiences, on meals or travel.

author: Cobie Smulders
quote: I am learning that in life it is OK to travel in darkness, not knowing what your next move is.
